sql-script.name: applets script
sql-script.tran-sql: create table simple_attention ( id bigint not null, accountid bigint not null, attentionid bigint not null, vtype tinyint not null, createdate datetime not null, primary key(id), unique (accountid, vtype, attentionid) );

create table simple_message_notification ( id bigint not null, sentid bigint not null, sentdate datetime not null, toid bigint not null, messageid bigint not null, subject varchar(80) not null, textbody varchar(256), primary key(id) ); simple_notification_log
create table simple_notification_log ( id bigint not null, notificationevent tinyint not null, sentdate datetime not null, toid bigint not null, primary key(id) );

create table simple_tag ( id bigint not null, tagtext varchar(32) not null, frequency int not null, views bigint not null, ttype tinyint not null, vtype tinyint not null, catalogid bigint not null, primary key(id), unique (tagtext, vtype, catalogid) );
